name: Bitwarden CLI (bw)
description: Installs the bitwarden CLI (bw) and optionally configures it to use a self-hosted server.

server.description: Provides the URL of your Bitwarden server, if you host your own server.

web_vault.description: Provides a custom web vault URL that differs from the base URL.

api.description: Provides a custom API URL that differs from the base URL.

identity.description: Provides a custom identity URL that differs from the base URL.

icons.description: Provides a custom icons service URL that differs from the base URL.

notifications.description: Provides a custom notifications URL that differs from the base URL.

events.description: Provides a custom events URL that differs from the base URL.

key_connector.description: Provides the URL for your Key Connector server.
